content: s azra love dino by halime özel @handmade_by_halime dear crochet lover much love time and effort have been put into designing this amigurumi and i would appreciate if you please give credit to me and add the following note to your item pattern by @handmade_by_halime this pattern is for free but that still means that you can not publish this pattern in any social media channel and youtube even if it s for free and you tagged me the pattern should only be available in my ravelry account that you can not mass-produce it and sell it in stores it is for personal use only that you can not reproduce the pattern and sell it as your own that you can not alternate some parts and because of that claim it as your pattern and publish it you can not translate to other language and publish it on your social media i m more than happy if you as a private person to gift or sell any items made from this pattern but always credit me as the designer please follow these simple steps as respect to me as the designer i give away this pattern for free but i still own the copyrights for it happy crocheting with love and respect halime abbreviations slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain/s dear crochet lover single_crochet single_crochet increase i ncrease crochet 2 single_crochet thank you so much for purchasing the pattern of azra s love dino i hope that you will enjoy in the same stitch crochet her as much as i loved designing her decrease d ecrease crochet 2 single_crochet together much love time and effort have been put into designing this amigurumi creation and i would bobble booble stitch appreciate if you do not share this pdf reproduce alterate or sell this pattern either in its double_crochet double_crochet entirety or in parts this pattern is for personal use only st stitch es round round s i would love to see your finished creation so please give credit to me and add following note … x x r epeat instructions in to your item pattern by @handmade_by_halime brackets x times i m more than happy for you to gift or sell any items made from this pattern but would love t otal number of stitches if you could credit me as a designer in the round or row chains not counted never hesitate to contact me through my instagram account or etsy shop and i will do my best to help you enjoy this pattern materials required with love halime yarn i used medium weight 4 ply cotton yarn the old pink love dino is made with drops safron the green love dino is made with yarn & colors favorite crochet hook 2 0 or 2 5 mm fibrefill / toy stuffing security eyes 5 mm stitch markers scissor and embroidery needle 2 head round 1 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 round 2 increase x 6 12 round 3 1 single_crochet increase
